item.description: Guide to Video Editing CapCut References (References:: (4) Theo - ping.gg on Twitter: “Just gave this a shot - holy shit it’s the best editor performance I’ve seen for giant videos.

item.title: It's Hard to Edit Writing
item.description: It’s Hard to Edit Writing We have [[Loss Aversion]] while editing. We have difficulty really engaging with our own writing.

item.title: Editing Dataview Entries - ObsidianMD
item.description: Editing Dataview Entries - ObsidianMD There is one solution out there that uses Dataview.js (the JavaScript version of Dataview) with Obsidian Buttons to mimic this behavior: Using metaedit, buttons, templater, nldtase and dataview together - Share & showcase - Obsidian Forum.
